mapper.select: SELECT `pui`.`id` AS `id`, `pua`.`account` AS `account`, `pua`.`status` AS `status`, `pua`.`group` AS `group`, `pui`.`alias` AS `alias`, `pui`.`avatar` AS `avatar`, `pui`.`name` AS `name`, `pui`.`sex` AS `sex`, `pui`.`birthday` AS `birthday`, `pui`.`create_date` AS `createDate`, `pui`.`update_date` AS `updateDate`, `pui`.`operate` AS `operate` FROM `p6e_user_info` AS `pui` LEFT JOIN `p6e_user_auth` AS `pua` ON `pui`.`id` = `pua`.`id` WHERE `pua`.`account` = #{account} AND `pua`.`password` = #{password}
